mapper.select: SELECT car_id, car_manufacture, car_category, car_name, car_year, car_fuel, car_seate_num, car_transmission FROM car_data;
SELECT car_id, car_manufacture, car_category, car_name, car_year, car_fuel, car_seate_num, car_transmission FROM car_data WHERE car_id = #{carId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car_data (car_manufacture, car_category, car_name, car_year, car_fuel, car_seate_num, car_transmission) VALUES (#{carManufacture}, #{carCategory}, #{carName}, #{carYear}, #{carFuel}, #{carSeateNum}, #{carTransmission});
